Summary: Run Healthchecks before the pre handover
Patch funcgen databases on ens-staging & ens-staging-grch37
Update table.sql in order to comply with all new schema patches
Run probe2transcript for all species with new genebuild
Copy data files to webdev directory
Description: Newly generated bigwig and bigbed files need to be copied to /nfs/ensnfs-webdev/staging/
Please don't forget to keep a copy of the tracking dbs in our genomics server.Also make sure that there are no tracking tables on staging

Summary: Make sure that the master branch passes all unit tests on Travis CI
Create new git branch for release <version>
Make sure that DEPRECATED.md is up to date
Description: All module / method deprecations should be listed in this file. Make sure that every API component that has been deprecated during the release period is in the list.

Summary: Create copies of tracking DBs on genomics servers
Description: Copy the final dbs from staging to genomics and add the tracking tables
Update the documentation around the data base schema as described here: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/seqdb/confluence/display/ensf/Creating+the+schema+documentation
Update the Regulation tutorial, which can be found here: http://www.ensembl.org/info/docs/api/funcgen/regulation_tutorial.html

Summary: Make blog post for known bugs
Clean unnecessary DBs from internal servers
